name: Dusty
description:
Dusty is a dungeon crawler where you have to spend your health points to purchase perks.

As one of  Mr.Necromancer's spawn, explore his dungeon and fight other creatures for a chance of getting your life back!

Controls:

- Move: [W], [A], [S], [D]
- Aim: [Mouse]
-Shoot: [LMB]
- Drop Weapon: [RMB]

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/dusty

Authors: DasPanjo and jvolonte
